snippet.title: The Outlast Trials Gameplay Reveal | Gamescom 2021
snippet.description:
Check out the first reveal of gameplay footage from The Outlast Trials.

Set in the height of the Cold War era, players take on the role of test subjects abducted by the shadowy Murkoff Corporation.  Imprisoned in a secret Murkoff facility, players will be thrust into a series of physical and mental ordeals, tormented by iconic characters, and challenged alone or in teams to survive with their sanity intact.

Wishlist The Outlast Trials:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1304930/The_Outlast_Trials/
https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/p/the-outlast-trials

For more about The Outlast Trials and Red Barrels follow us on:
→ Instagram: https://instagram.com/the.redbarrels/ 
→ Twitter: https://twitter.com/theredbarrels 
→ Facebook: https://facebook.com/RedBarrels & https://www.facebook.com/Outlastthegame/ 
→ Twitch: https://twitch.tv/theredbarrels/

#TheOutlastTrials #Outlast #RedBarrels #Gameplay #Gamescom #Gaming
